short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple daily planner and to -do list  to ease your life and increase your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple to use daily planner to help you stay focused on your work flow for the entire day.
This to-do list chrome extension helps you track your work and help you know how much of the work is yet to be done. 
After you complete any of the task, you can click on the cross mark and the task will disappear indicating that you have got victory over that.
Similarly, you can as well add your works with "Set For Day" button and the work that you have planned to do will appear there.

Hope it helps you to focus on your work and get the  maximum out of day without any deviation. 
Cheers to the maximum productivity that can be brought in us!!!
